description:
http://anidb.net/ch48125 [Wooser] is a yellow creature who at first glance looks sweet but actually hides a wicked heart. He is awakened one year after a tragedy that claimed many victims. Confused from the time slip, he sees a general who looks just like him. Wooser resolves to assassinate and replace the general, and remake history to his own liking.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
After the tragedy that claimed so many lives, Wooser awakens in a mechanical castle.  Caught off guard by the sudden time slip, he witnesses a general who looks just like him...  Wooser kills the general and takes his place, and now he`s off to warp history to his own twisted ends... maybe!  He may just go watch TV.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Beginn ~Die Szenerie eines bestimmten Tages, Das tägliche Leben der Mädchen, Woosers Rückkehr~
The Beginning: The Scenery of a Certain Day, The Girls` Daily Lives, The Return of Wooser
始動 ~とある日の風景, 少女たちの日常, 帰ってきたうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
Caught once again in a time warp, Wooser awakens to find himself drifting into port on a ship unlike any he`s ever seen.  The port is surrounded by multiple battleships, and the situation is dire.  But Wooser puts his counterattack plan into operation!  But what can he do with only one ship and limited weapons?  What fate will befall our hero just before he wakes up and finds out it was all a dream!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gerechtigkeit ~Ein einsamer Kampf, Ein versprochener Sieg für Mutter, Wooser spielt auf Unentschieden~
Justice: A Lonely Battle, A Sworn Victory for Mother, Wooser Goes for the Draw
正義 ~孤独なる戦い, 母に誓う勝利, 引き分け狙いのうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
After his battle with the enemy fleet, Wooser is hired as a tactical advisor.  He agrees, and is taken to a magical kingdom made of candy.  But this splendid, delicious land conceals a dark secret.  Where did all the people go?  ... we`ll probably never find out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kingdom: Memories Faded, Memories Unfading, The Cutest Wooser in the World
Königreich ~Vergessenes, Unvergessliches, Der niedlichste Wooser der Welt~
王国 ~色あせた記録, 色褪せぬ記憶, 世界一かわいいうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
Wooser drops his wallet, along with the letter for the queen, and is forced to spend the night outside.  The crackling of a fire, the twinkling of the stars in the sky... forget the queen, and forget the letter.  Just as wooser is about to fall into a peaceful slumber, a horde of monsters attack!  An army of immortal soldiers and dark conspiracy controlling them... do not feature in this episode!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evolution ~Fragmente eines flüchtigen Traumes, Geleitet von leuchtenden Sternen, Wooser geht seinen Weg~
Evolution: Fragments of Ephemeral Dreams, Guidance of Shining Stars, Wooser Going His Own Way
進化 ~儚き夢の欠片, きらめく星の導き, 我が道を行くうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
"Avenge me," the man whispered as he died.  Following clues found in the man`s belongings, Wooser visits heaven on earth, a girl`s high school!  As Wooser is caught up in the troubles of the student council, he realizes something is wrong... This school has no uniforms!  An unhappy Wooser chances upon a local restaurant... maybe he`ll find something nice there.  I hope so.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Promise: A Passion for Uniforms, A Family Restaurant is Fine, Burning Wooser
Versprechen ~Eine Leidenschaft für Uniformen, Günstige Restaurants sind auch okay, Wooser brennt~
約束 ~制服にかける情熱, ファミレスでもいい, 燃え滾るうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
After a long journey, Wooser finds himself in a world where humans are ruled by machines.  "I`m an animal, though, so I don`t care," says Wooser, unconcerned. But an endless assault by robot soldiers puts him up against the wall: "At this rate, I`ll run out of quarters..."  He`s barely got enough money to make bus fare home... can he awaken to a new power?  Maybe? Please?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trust: Midsummer Night Illusion, Mechanical Comrade, Wooser Doesn`t Have Many Friends
Vertrauen ~Mittsommernachtsträume, Mechanische Begleiter, Wooser hat nicht viele Freunde~
信頼 ~真夏の夜の幻, 機械仕掛けの戦友, 友達が少ないうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
Wooser manages to swap the doors to the men`s and women`s baths through the sheer power of his lust.  Meanwhile, an unidentified object appears in the skies over America, and the military starts to panic.  Will we be able to talk to them?  Will Ajipon`s noble sacrifice once again save the world?  Will it? Will it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inevitability: The World Changes. The Future Lies Ahead. Wooser Refuses to Move Forward
必然 ~変わりゆく世界, その先にある未来, 進む気がないうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
Wooser, with the help of an army of river otters, goes to an audition to become an idol, but just before his performance it`s discovered that some of his group are actually sea otters and beavers.  "But I want to sing!", Wooser yells.  To defeat the other idols, Wooser will (not) have to pilot a giant robot with resolve in his heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cheers: A Time for Blessings, Keep Common Sense in Mind, Because Wooser Won`t
喝采 ~祝福の時, わきまえたい常識, わきまえないうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
Wooser awakes in the world of the dead.  Things seem very strange there.  To get a better idea of the situation, he turns on the TV.  There he sees Darth Wooser, who tells him of the day when he changed fate, and the sorrowful events he`d forgotten.  Wait, no, that`s the weather he`s reading
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Recollections: The Real You, the Truth You Must Confront, Wooser Turns Away
追憶 ~本当の自分, 向かい合うべき真実, 目を逸らすうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
Wooser is on the run for a murder he didn`t commit, and decides that while he`s on the run from the law, he should try and commit a few more crimes.  So he steals the production fund for the anime and uses it to search for buried treasure.  As Wooser goes out of control, the hammer of justice descends upon him... and lands about 3 feet to the left.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fate: The Strongest Enemy Appears; A Cruel, Inescapable Destiny; Wooser is Judged
因果 ~現れた最強の敵, 抗えぬ過酷な運命, 裁かれるうーさー~

REGULAR.description:
As the last episode approaches, Wooser has run out of jokes.  In a last, desperate attempt, he searches for "Out of jokes".  Help me Go*gle Wan Kenobi, you`re my only hope!  At the same time, he searches for "Cannons and Drills to help you on the battlefield", but he can`t find the cannon part he needs.  Cannon! Bring me a cannon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hope: Lalalalalalalalalaalalalaa, lalalalalalalalalaalalalaa
希望 ~ラララララララララーラララー, ラララララララララーラララー~

REGULAR.description:
"If only I could turn back time..." she whispered, smiling sadly.  Even if learning the truth hurts you, people can become stronger, and time will heal all wounds.  There is nothing to hear.  I pray that your future will be a bright and shining one.  And for that to happen, I will carry the weight of this sin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Awakening: Love Drawn in Starry Skies, Your Present is Me, Thank You, Wooser
覚醒 ~星空に描く愛, プレゼントはオレだ, ありがとううーさー~
Ending

WIKIPEDIA_JP: うーさーのその日暮らし

titles.title: Wooser no Sono Higurashi: Kakusei Hen
Wooser`s Hand-to-Mouth Life: Awakening Arc
うーさーのその日暮らし 覚醒編
兔宝的悲惨日常 觉醒篇
Project Wooser 2
